import sys
I = sys.stdin.readline
O = sys.stdout.write
t = int(I())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(I())
    arr = list(map(int, I().split()))
    x = set(arr)
    if (n - len(x)) % 2 == 0:
        O(str(len(x)) + '\n')
    else:
        O(str(len(x) - 1) + '\n')

import math
t = int(input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l2 = list(set(l))
    if len(l) % 2 == len(l2) % 2:
        print(len(l2))
    else:
        print(len(l2) - 1)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = set(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = len(a)
    if n % 2 != ans % 2:
        ans -= 1
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
arrow = []
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    a = a.split()

    if (n - len(a)) % 2 == 0:
        ans = len(a)

    arrow.append(ans)
    t -= 1

import math, sys
input = sys.stdin.readline
S = lambda : input().rstrip()
I = lambda : int(S())
M = lambda : map(int, S().split())
L = lambda : list(M())
mod1 = 1000000007
mod2 = 998244353
from collections import Counter
for _ in range(I()):
    n = I()
    arr = L()
    C = Counter(arr)
    deleted = n - len(C)
    if deleted % 2 == 0:
        ans = len(C)
        print(ans)
    else:
        ans = len(C) - 1
        print(ans)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = list(set(a))
    print(len(a) - (len(a) - len(b) + (len(a) - len(b)) % 2))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    m = n - len(set(arr))
    print(n - 2 * ((m + 1) // 2))

from collections import Counter
from itertools import count
for s in [*open(0)][2::2]:
    l = Counter(map(int, s.split()))
    print(len(l) - (sum(l.values()) - len(l) & 1))

t = int(input())
ns = []
strIn = []
for _ in range(t):
    ns.append(input())
    strIn.append(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = ns[i]
    inp = strIn[i]
    nums = [int(p) for p in inp.split()]
    num_set = set(nums)
    rem_len = len(nums)
    while rem_len > len(num_set):
        rem_len -= 2
    print(rem_len)

t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    t = t - 1
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = len(set(arr))
    b = len(arr)
    c = b - a
    if c % 2 == 0:
        print(a)
    else:
        print(a - 1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input()) % 2
    ls = len(set(input().split()))
    print(ls - n ^ ls % 2)

    n = int(input())
    t = list(map(int, input().split()))
    t_s = set(t)
    lt = len(t)
    while len(t_s) < lt:
        lt -= 2
    print(lt)

numCases = int(input())
for case in range(numCases):
    input()
    array = input().split(' ')
    numDuplicates = len(array) - len(set(array))
    elementsRemoved = numDuplicates
    if elementsRemoved % 2 == 1:
        elementsRemoved += 1
    print(len(array) - elementsRemoved)

    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = set(a)
    print(n - 2 * ((len(a) - len(b) + 1) // 2))

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    lst = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = len(lst)
    b = set(lst)
    c = len(b)
    while c < a:
        a = a - 2
    print(a)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    arr = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    ans = list(set(arr))
    dist = len(ans)
    if dist % 2 == 0 and n % 2 != 0 or (dist % 2 != 0 and n % 2 == 0):
        print(dist - 1)
    else:
        print(dist)
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = len(set(l))
    print([x - 1, x][n % 2 == x % 2])
